rows.label: qev041406_MSG0001
rows.name: That explosion came from caravan of Pisa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0002
rows.name:
Pisa was very thorough when teaching Popote how
to make fireworks, but stupid idiot probably just...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Hello? Yes, Pisa here. Is this Popote?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0004
rows.name:
Fireworks went BOOM! But Popote did exactly as
Pisa said, so this all fault of Pisa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0005
rows.name:
Er, Popote is sure he used exact amount of autiga
powder Pisa said to?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0006
rows.name:
Popote have better things to do than sit around
measuring all day! Besides, more powder mean bigger
fireworks. Any dummy know that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0007
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0008
rows.name:
Forget all that! Stupid firework blast sent Popote
flying onto floaty ship near caravan. Pisa need to
get up here and help NOW![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0009
rows.name: Also, Popote hungry. So bring coldberries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0010
rows.name:
Also also, Popote only eat berries with spicy sacrifole
pollen on top, so bring that too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0011
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0012
rows.name:
*cough* Hmm? Why so stiff? If Pisa need very thorough
massage, Elder Nan happy toâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0013
rows.name: DON'T TOUCH PISA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0014
rows.name:
Augh! That very last straw! Pisa done with ALL these
idiots! Going to start over with a brand-new life here
in city of human friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_JNK0010
rows.name: Stop

rows.label: qev041406_SEL0011
rows.name: Convince Pisa not to make any rash decisions.

rows.label: qev041406_JNK0020
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: qev041406_SEL0021
rows.name: Encourage Pisa to run and not look back.

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0015
rows.name:
Pisa had it up to HERE with these Nopon! Popote
and Nan can both rot. Good riddance forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0016
rows.name:
Pisa glad that friend understand. Popote and Nan
can both rot for all Pisa care. Good riddance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0017
rows.name: Oof! Um...bye, Pisa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0018
rows.name:
Ah well. It was probably inevitable. Still, if friend could
go check on Popote, it would be huge help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0019
rows.name:
OooOOOH! Such loveliness! Pisa want to try
wearing something that shiny someday.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041406_MSG0020
rows.name:
...Hmm? Popote? Who is that? Pisa never heard of
big dumb jerk named Popote.[ST:wait ]
